unnormalised: Ed-Tech Alert: Scholarship Portals Making College Dreams Easier!
normalised: Ed-Tech Alert: Scholarship Portals Making College Dreams Easier!

unnormalised: Feeling the pinch of those hefty college fees? Relax, bhai! A new wave of scholarship portals is making waves in the ed-tech scene, connecting deserving students with funding opportunities. Think of it as a Tinder, but for your academic dreams!
normalised: Feeling the pinch of those hefty college fees? Relax, brother! A new wave of scholarship portals is making waves in the ed-tech scene, connecting deserving students with funding opportunities. Think of it as a Tinder, but for your academic dreams!

unnormalised: These platforms, like the "Vidya Lakshmi Portal" and smaller, regional gems, are compiling scholarships from across India - Govt., private, even that random uncle in Delhi offering Rs. 5000 for toppers! Finding the right one used to be a major headache, but now it's all neatly organized.
normalised: These platforms, like the "Vidya Lakshmi Portal" and smaller, regional gems, are compiling scholarships from across India - Government, private, even that random uncle in Delhi offering rupees five thousand for toppers! Finding the right one used to be a major headache, but now it's all neatly organized.

unnormalised: Many portals also offer tips on writing killer essays and acing those interviews. Some are even hosting webinars at 16:00 hrs every Tuesday. Deadlines are crucial, folks! Don't miss out – applications for some close on 26/01/2024, while others have rolling deadlines until 31/12/2024. Get on it now, and maybe you can finally afford that trip to Goa with your college gang after exams on 10/05/2024! College life, here we come!
normalised: Many portals also offer tips on writing killer essays and acing those interviews. Some are even hosting webinars at sixteen hundred hours every Tuesday. Deadlines are crucial, folks! Don't miss out – applications for some close on twenty sixth January two thousand and twenty four, while others have rolling deadlines until thirty first December two thousand and twenty four.
